cause.description:
Autism affects everyone. 1 in 150 children have this developmental disorder. Every 20 minutes another child is diagnosed. It is vital to our society to help people with this life long developmental disorder. Often people with autism are discrimated against and abused because people lack the basic understanding of this disorder and related disorders like Asperger's Syndrome. If people were to only take the time to learn a little about autism and Asperger Syndrome the world would be a better place.
1. Autism affects 1 in 150 kids.
2. Families affected with autism need help and understanding.
3. People with autism deserve respect.
cause.mission: promote autism and Asperger Syndrome awareness and acceptence
cause.name: Autism & Asperger's Awareness
